Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it stands out from the rest. We believe its value surpasses $12000, but we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is an opportunity not just to own a remarkable product, but also to experience unparalleled quality and service. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
